definition: variant of 駕馭|驾驭[jia4 yu4]
surname Jia
to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
to resist/imperial/(classical) to drive (a chariot)/to manage/to govern

sentences.english: Let me give you some examples of how Merrill is riding that next wave.
sentences.chinese: 讓我舉幾個美林如何駕御下一個浪潮的事例。

sentences.english: The German team has shown high leve1s of control and communication between the horse and the rider.
sentences.chinese: 德國隊表現了很高的駕御馬並與馬溝通的水平。

sentences.english: Especially in buying and selling off-season, more to drive every clinch a deal opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 特別是在買賣淡季，更要駕御每個成交的機遇。

sentences.english: I keep that energy reined in, harness it, so that I can ride it even further.
sentences.chinese: 我支配駕御着我的精力，以更好的使用它。

sentences.english: That path should be one that founders can skillfully navigate.
sentences.chinese: 而那條道路應該是創始人能夠嫺熟駕御的。

sentences.english: I am master of my fate; I am the captain of my soul. (From William Ernest Henley)
sentences.chinese: 我是命運的主人，我能駕御我的靈魂。

sentences.english: Most people in China think thin your government is out to lunch.
sentences.chinese: 許多中國人以爲美國政府是由我們美國國民駕御的。

definition: full of youthful vigor (idiom)/in the prime of youth
protective coloration/camouflage
to let emotions affect one's decisions
wine, sex, avarice and temper (idiom); four cardinal vices
to make a fool of oneself
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
incurable/incorrigible/beyond cure/hopeless
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
chicken-hearted (idiom)/gutless
lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
family scandal/skeleton in the closet
the shrike and the swallow fly in different directions (idiom)/(usually of a couple) to part from each other
strong in appearance but weak in reality (idiom)
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
